items.q: When most people ____________________ (hear) the word "oil," they immediately think of gasoline.
Oil has many additional uses that most people ____________________ (not/ know) about.
Oil was used in ancient China to polish swords and armor when the soldiers ____________________ (go) to war.
In fact, the Chinese used to filter fine oil through a cloth and ____________________ (use) it as a skin balm.
Legends even tell of the Greek armies destroying their enemies by ____________________ (pour) burning oil into the sea.
The lawyer was working on an intriguing environmental law case. ____________________
Many people graduating from college prefer to find work in an urban setting. ____________________
We're eventually going to repaint the living room, but there's no hurry right now. ____________________
Albert Einstein's chief contribution to science was his theory of relativity. ____________________
The English department is going to expand its choice of online courses next semester. ____________________
Uncle Greg is convinced that flying cars are the way of the future. ____________________
Carl very handily replaced the front tire on my bicycle. ____________________
Paula's constant chattering hindered her colleagues from making an important deadline. ____________________
(1) ____ a. are flying b. fly c. will fly
(2) ____ a. analyzed b. are analyzing c. have analyzed
(3) ____ a. have increased b. had increased c. are increasing
(4) ____ a. are discussing b. discuss c. were discussing
(5) ____ a. had b. have c. are having
(6) ____ a. is b. was c. are
(7) ____ a. has put b. put c. is putting
(8) ____ a. decide b. decided c. will decide
It's difficult to get in touch with Anna these days ____ her cell phone not working. a. for this reason b. consequently c. on account of
____ verify your education when necessary, you should retain all records of your education, including transcripts and diplomas. a. In addition to b. In order to c. Because of
A possible ____ of children not getting enough sleep is doing poorly on tests. a. factor b. reason c. consequence
As a ____ of speaking with a customer service representative, I received a full refund on my purchase. a. result b. cause c. reason
____ I've been going to yoga classes three times per week, I've been getting stronger and more flexible. a. Since b. Therefore c. Owing to
Did you know that the wings of an albatross are so long and narrow that it could fly for hours without ever flapping its wings? a. knew b. are c. could
If every computer owner in the world were to illegally download only one song, then there are 400 million illegally downloaded songs. a. were b. download c. are
Most voters who consider themselves independent vote not just for a Democrat or a Republican, but for the candidate that they felt will do the best job. a. consider b. vote c. felt
Had the pharmaceutical company known of the deleterious effects of the new drug, it will have never been sold . a. known b. will c. sold
After losing sales and spending the last six months in a slump, the stock rose sharply and reaches new highs. a. losing b. rose c. reaches
Several ____ prevented the house renovations from being completed on time. a. obstacles b. forecasts c. scenarios
The ____ for the afternoon doesn't look good. We should probably cancel our plans to go to the beach. a. forecast b. capture c. example
In the class debate, both teams were ____ of defending their side of the argument. a. prevalent b. tempting c. incapable
It was clear that the ring on her finger was not an ____ diamond. a. intriguing b. authentic c. urban
____ Ken's low score on his final exam, he failed the course. a. Eventually b. On account of c. This means that
Irene's driving record was ____ after she was caught speeding for the third time. a. tempting b. prevalent c. tarnished
The magician's animated performance ____ the attention of the children in the audience. a. captured b. convinced c. mitigated
My parents encouraged me to ____ a career in medicine. a. revolutionize b. pursue c. hinder
defeat _____
care about something _____
the means ____ something
_____ in a dispute
obtain a_____
unintended _____
span _____
_____ someone's help
a brutal _____
my overall _____ of
Because the sun was shining and everyone was ready to hit the beach. _______________
Since you did not get the invitation on time. _______________
Most of the employees there who have to work two jobs because the pay is so low. _______________
Many of the top-selling video games of today that are no longer designed just for kids. _______________
As you are the only person to whom I have revealed this information. _______________
The mountaintops that were covered in snow. _______________
After the phone rang five or six times and nobody answered it. _______________
It is proven that the fruit that comes from those countries. _______________
The dog took its bone and buried it in the yard. _______________
I think I've seen you several times before, but I don't think we've met yet. _______________
A cause-effect essay can analyze the ways in which one or more effects result from a particular cause. _______________
An appropriate topic for a cause-effect essay would be the impact of following a vegetarian diet. _______________
There is only one way to organize a cause-effect essay: focus-on-effects. _______________
Making two lists (one for causes, one for effects) is a good way to brainstorm your supporting details when preparing to write a cause-effect essay. _______________
Some common transitions and connectors in a comparison essay are in the meantime, subsequently , and immediately . _______________
What are the effects of exercise? Write a cause-effect essay. Be sure to use verb tenses consistently.
